bit_field.name: STAT_BRK_EN
bit_field.description: Enable or disable brake during stationary

settings.description: All three high-side FETs turned ON
All three low-side FETs turned ON
Brake current threshold is used to come out of Brake state
Brake time is used to come out of Brake state

bit_field.name: STARTUP_BRK_TIME
bit_field.description: Brake time when motor is stationary

bit_field.name: RESYNC_MIN_THRESHOLD
bit_field.description: Minimum phase BEMF below which the motor is coasted instead of resync

bit_field.name: ALIGN_CURR_THR
bit_field.description: Align current threshold (Align current threshold (A) = ALIGN_CURR_THR /  CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: IPD_CURR_THR
bit_field.description: IPD current threshold (IPD current threshold (A) = IPD_CURR_THR / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: IPD_REPEAT
bit_field.description: Number of times IPD is executed

settings.description: Open loop current limit defined by ILIMIT
Open loop current limit defined by OL_ILIMIT

bit_field.name: OL_DUTY
bit_field.description: Duty cycle limit during open loop

bit_field.name: OL_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: Open loop current limit (OL current threshold (A) = OL_CURR_THR / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: OPN_CL_HANDOFF_THR
bit_field.description: Open to closed loop handoff threshold

settings.description: Close loop deceleration defined by CL_ACC
Close loop deceleration defined by CL_DEC

bit_field.name: HV_BCOMP_SEL
bit_field.description: Select either Internal HV comparators or LV comparators for the trapezoidal control

settings.description: Output FG in open loop and closed loop
Output FG in only closed loop
Output FG in open loop for the first try.
FG active as long as motor is driven
FG active till speed drops below BEMF threshold defined by FG_BEMF_THR

bit_field.name: ACT_SPIN_BRK_THR
bit_field.description: Duty cycle threshold for motor stop using active spin down, low- and high-side braking

bit_field.name: BRAKE_DUTY_THRESHOLD
bit_field.description: Duty cycle threshold for BRAKE pin based low-side braking

bit_field.name: CBC_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: Cycle by Cycle (CBC) current limit (CBC current limit (A) = CBC_ILIMIT / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: DYN_DGS_FILT_COUNT
bit_field.description: Number of samples needed for dynamic degauss check

bit_field.name: INTEG_CYCL_THR_LOW
bit_field.description: Number of BEMF samples per 30° below which commutation method switches from integration to ZC

bit_field.name: INTEG_CYCL_THR_HIGH
bit_field.description: Number of BEMF samples per 30° above which commutation method switches from ZC to integration

bit_field.name: INTEG_DUTY_THR_LOW
bit_field.description: Duty cycle below which commutation method switches from integration to ZC

bit_field.name: INTEG_DUTY_THR_HIGH
bit_field.description: Duty cycle above which commutation method switches from ZC to integration

bit_field.name: BEMF_THRESHOLD2
bit_field.description: BEMF threshold for integration based commutation during falling floating phase voltage

bit_field.name: BEMF_THRESHOLD1
bit_field.description: BEMF threshold for integration based commutation during rising floating phase voltage

bit_field.name: WCOMP_BLANK_EN
bit_field.description: Enable WCOMP blanking during fast deceleration

bit_field.name: DYN_BRK_CURR_LOW_LIM
bit_field.description: Fast deceleration dynamic current limit lower threshold (Deceleration current lower threshold (A) = DYN_BRK_CURR_LOW_LIM / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: DYNAMIC_BRK_CURR
bit_field.description: Enable dynamic decrease in current limit during fast deceleration

bit_field.name: FAST_DECEL_CURR_LIM
bit_field.description: Deceleration current threshold (Fast Deceleration current limit upper threshold (A) = FAST_DECEL_CURR_LIM /  CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: SPD_POWER_V_MAX
bit_field.description: Upper saturation limit for speed/ power loop

bit_field.name: SPD_POWER_V_MIN
bit_field.description: Lower saturation limit for speed/power loop

settings.description: Automatic recovery next PWM cycle; nFAULT active; driver is in recirculation mode
Automatic recovery next PWM cycle; nFAULT inactive; driver is in recirculation mode
Automatic recovery if VSOX < CBC_ILIMIT; nFAULT active; driver is in recirculation mode (Only available with high-side modulation)
Automatic recovery if VSOX < CBC_ILIMIT; nFAULT inactive; driver is in recirculation mode (Only available with high-side modulation)
Automatic recovery after CBC_RETRY_PWM_CYC;  nFAULT active; driver is in recirculation mode
Automatic recovery after CBC_RETRY_PWM_CYC; nFAULT inactive; driver is in recirculation mode
VSOX > CBC_ILIMIT is report only but no action is taken
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled
Cycle by Cycle limit is disabled

bit_field.name: LOCK_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: Lock detection current limit (Lock detection current limit (A) = LOCK_ILIMIT / CSA_GAIN)

settings.description: Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is tristated
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in high-side brake mode (All high-side FETs are turned ON)
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in low-side brake mode (All low-side FETs are turned ON)
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is tristated
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in high-side brake mode (All high-side FETs are turned ON)
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in low-side brake mode (All low-side FETs are turned ON)
Ilimit lock detection is in report only but no action is taken

bit_field.name: LOCK_ILIMIT_DEG
bit_field.description: Lock detection current limit deglitch time

bit_field.name: CBC_RETRY_PWM_CYC
bit_field.description: Number of PWM cycles for CBC current limit to retry

settings.description: Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is tristated
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in high-side brake mode (All high-side FETs are turned ON)
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in low-side brake mode (All low-side FETs are turned ON)
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is tristated
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in high-side brake mode (All high-side FETs are turned ON)
Automatic recovery after tLCK_RETRY; Gate driver is in low-side brake mode (All low-side FETs are turned ON)
Motor lock detection is in report only but no action is taken

bit_field.name: LOSS_SYNC_TIMES
bit_field.description: Number of times sync lost for loss of sync lock fault

bit_field.name: NO_MTR_THR
bit_field.description: No motor lock current threshold   (No motor lock current threshold (A) = NO_MTR_THR / CSA_GAIN)

settings.description: Automatic clear if voltage in bounds
Automatic clear if voltage in bounds

bit_field.name: LOCK_MIN_SPEED
bit_field.description: Speed below which lock fault is triggered

bit_field.name: ABN_LOCK_SPD_RATIO
bit_field.description: Ratio of electrical speed between two consecutive cycles above which abnormal speed lock fault is triggered

bit_field.name: ZERO_DUTY_THR
bit_field.description: Duty cycle below which target speed is zero

bit_field.name: RESERVED
bit_field.description: reserved bits for algo parameter update

bit_field.name: SPEED_INP_MASK
bit_field.description: Number of speed input mask bits

bit_field.name: AVS_NEG_CURR_LIMIT
bit_field.description: AVS negative current limit (AVS negative current limit (A) = (AVS_NEG_CURRENT_LIMIT * 3 /4095) / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: AVS_LIMIT_HYST
bit_field.description: AVS current hysteresis (AVS positive current limit (A) = ((AVS_LIMIT_HYST + AVS_NEG_CURR_LIMIT) * 3 /4095) / CSA_GAIN)

bit_field.name: ISD_BEMF_THR
bit_field.description: ISD BEMF threshold (ISD BEMF threshold = 200 * ISD_BEMF_THR)

bit_field.name: ZC_ANGLE_OL_THR
bit_field.description: Angle above which the ZC detection is done during OL

bit_field.name: DGS_HIGH_IND_EN
bit_field.description: Degauss Filter for High Inductance Enable

bit_field.name: ZERO_DUTY_HYST
bit_field.description: Duty cycle hysteresis to exit standby

bit_field.name: DACOUT1_VAR_ADDR
bit_field.description: 12-bit address of variable to be monitored

bit_field.name: DACOUT2_VAR_ADDR
bit_field.description: 12-bit address of variable to be monitored

settings.description: Overwrite Hardware pin with Active Brake
Overwrite Hardware pin with brake functionality disabled
Overwrite Hardware pin with clockwise rotation OUTA-OUTB-OUTC
Overwrite Hardware pin with counter clockwise rotation OUTA-OUTC-OUTB
Pin 37 as DACOUT2 and pin 38 as DACOUT1
FG continues to toggle till motor stops
FG in Hi-Z state, pulled up externally

bit_field.name: INPUT_MAX_FREQUENCY
bit_field.description: Maximum frequency (in Hz) for frequency based speed input

settings.description: 325 Hz to 100 kHz speed PWM input
10 Hz to 325 Hz speed PWM input
No clear fault command is issued
To clear the latched fault bits. This bit automatically resets after being written.

bit_field.name: PWM100_DUTY_SEL
bit_field.description: Frequency of PWM at 100% duty cycle

settings.description: SPI fault reporting on nFAULT pin is enabled
SPI fault reporting on nFAULT pin is disabled
Over temperature reporting on nFAULT is disabled
Over temperature reporting on nFAULT is enabled
Enter Low Power Mode Selected by LP_MODE
OCP clearing in PWM input cycle change is disabled
OCP clearing in PWM input cycle change is enabled
Overcurrent causes an automatic retrying fault
Overcurrent is report only but no action is taken
Overcurrent is not reported and no action is taken

bit_field.name: ADCOMP_TH_LS
bit_field.description: Active demag comparator threshold for low-side

bit_field.name: ADCOMP_TH_HS
bit_field.description: Active demag comparator threshold for high-side
